summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Second Serve food rescue application. All core features are working correctly including multi-role authentication, donation management, order creation, driver assignment, and impact statistics.
passed_tests: API Health Check - All endpoints accessible
Impact Statistics API - Returns correct data structure
User Registration - All three roles (donor, recipient, driver)
User Login - All three roles with proper authentication
Get Current User - Role-based authentication working
Create Donation - Donors can create food donations
Get Donations - All roles can view donations with proper filtering
Create Order - Recipients can request food with dietary preferences
Get Available Orders - Drivers can view pending orders
Assign Driver - Drivers can accept orders
Update Order Status - Delivery status updates working
Landing Page Load - Page loads with proper branding and navigation
Impact Statistics Display - All stats visible and updating
User Registration Flow - Complete signup process for all roles
Donation Creation Flow - Full donation form submission
Food Request Flow - Recipients can browse and request food
Driver Assignment Flow - Drivers can accept and manage deliveries
End-to-End Workflow - Complete donation → request → delivery cycle
Role-based Dashboard Routing - Users redirected to correct dashboards
Impact Statistics Updates - Stats reflect completed deliveries
